body_html:
Can you do
$ ls $(bazel info output_base)/external/local_config_cuda/crosstool
after ./configure?
If that already shows error_gpu_disabled, your first bazel fetch didn't work (and didn't configure cuda support)
body_text:

$ ls $(bazel info output_base)/external/local_config_cuda/crosstool

body:

$ ls $(bazel info output_base)/external/local_config_cuda/crosstool
